import React, { Fragment, useState }from 'react' import Calculators from './Calculators' const INITIAL_STATE = { waist:'', weight:'', gender: '', } const Bmi = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(INITIAL_STATE); const { waist, weight, gender } = formData; const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); showMessage(); clearMessage(); } const showMessage = () => { let result; if (gender === 'Female' ) { result = Math.ceil(( (4.15 * Math.ceil(waist)) - (0.082 * Math.ceil(weight)) - 76.76)/weight * 100) } else if (gender === 'Male' ) { result = Math.ceil(( (4.15 * Math.ceil(waist)) - (0.082 * Math.ceil(weight)) - 98.42)/weight * 100) }; } const clearMessage = () => { setTimeout(() => { document.getElementById('result').style.display = 'none'; setFormData(INITIAL_STATE); }, 4000) } return (

YMCA Body Fat Percentage Calculator

BMI is a measurement of a person's leanness or corpulence based on their height and weight, and is intended to quantify tissue mass. It is widely used as a general indicator of whether a person has a healthy body weight for their height.

Waist size: (cm)

onChange(e)}/>

Weight: (kg)

onChange(e)}/>
BMI Range Category
> 16 Severe Thinness
> 16 - 17 Moderate Thinness
> 17 - 18.5 Mild Thinness
18.5 - 25 Normal
25 - 30 Overweight
30 - 35 Obese class I
35 - 40 Obese Class II
40 < Obese Class III
) } export default Bmi
